Sentencas: NiO/yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) powder was prepared by coating precipitation of ZrOCl2.8H(2)O and YCl3, which produced a layer of amorphous zirconium hydroxide homogeneously coated onto the surface of NiO powder.
Titulo: Preparation and properties of Ni/YSZ anode by coating precipitation method

Sentencas: The YSZ coating layer was crystallized to cubic ZrO2 with the size of about 20 nm after calcining at 600 and 800 degreesC, respectively.
Titulo: Preparation and properties of Ni/YSZ anode by coating precipitation method

Sentencas: The main microstructure change was the agglomeration and coarsening of metallic Ni.
Titulo: Preparation and properties of Ni/YSZ anode by coating precipitation method

Sentencas: The YSZ coating layer on the NiO surface using the coating precipitation method efficiently prevented the sintering and agglomeration of Ni.
Titulo: Preparation and properties of Ni/YSZ anode by coating precipitation method

Sentencas: YSZ formed a continuous network structure, and Ni particles were dispersed homogeneously in the YSZ network through SEM analysis, which made a great contribution to the improvement of electrical conductivity of the Ni/YSZ cermet.
Titulo: Preparation and properties of Ni/YSZ anode by coating precipitation method

Sentencas: The conductivity reached about 900 S/cm between 600 and 800 degreesC, so it was a suitable candidate anode material for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Preparation and properties of Ni/YSZ anode by coating precipitation method
Preparation and properties of Ni/YSZ anode by coating precipitation method
